# Generated by master_nodb_fix_v2.1
# Using exact versions for capsule reproducibility

# Core dependencies (exactly pinned)
pandas==1.5.3
numpy==1.23.5
pyarrow==15.0.0  # For Parquet support (requires Python >= 3.8)

# AST manipulation (for Python < 3.9)
astor==0.8.1; python_version < '3.9'

# Topology computation backends (optional but recommended)
ripser==0.6.4  # Fast Betti number computation
gudhi==3.8.0  # Alternative topology backend
scipy==1.10.1  # Fallback topology backend

# WebSocket support (optional)
websockets==12.0

# YAML processing (for capsule system)
